title: PBE signups not going through
body: So recently I saw on the  PBE website that I had been accepted, but at the time I couldn't reach a computer and finish the process. Today April, 9th 2017 I went to signup and the link keeps telling me that there is maintenance going on. I went on some previous posts and saw that there was a link to the maintenance stuff and I clicked on it and it showed that everything was working properly. Help?

replies.body: PBE signups are closed for maintenance for the time being. You can check the status of the signup page [**here**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe), and also be sure to check out the post we made about the [**future of pbe**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed)!
